name: Business Licenses

creator.name: BSEED (Buildings, Safety Engineering, and Environmental Department)

description: A Business License is the Cityâ€™s stamp of approval for a business to operate within the city limits. The business licenses are used for certifying the type of business and that they may operate in the city at that location per the Zoning Ordinance.

variableMeasured.name: X
variableMeasured.description: Longitudinal coordinate associated with the business street address

variableMeasured.name: Y
variableMeasured.description: Latitudinal coordinate associated with the business street address

variableMeasured.name: business_id
variableMeasured.description: Unique identifier used to track this business within BSEED's Accela database.

variableMeasured.name: business_name
variableMeasured.description: The name of the business, which could be the Doing Business As (DBA) name, an affiliated Limited Liability Company (LLC) or a personal name.

variableMeasured.name: business_type
variableMeasured.description: The type of the business as defined by Detroit City Code.

variableMeasured.name: parcel_id
variableMeasured.description: Unique number used to track the parcel of land the business is located on. Parcel IDs are assigned by the Office of the Assessor.

variableMeasured.name: lon
variableMeasured.description: Longitudinal coordinate associated with the business street address

variableMeasured.name: lat
variableMeasured.description: Latitudinal coordinate associated with the business street address

variableMeasured.name: ObjectId
variableMeasured.description: ID assigned to each data set record when uploaded to the ODP softwate service (Esri's ArcGIS Online)

variableMeasured.name: address_id
variableMeasured.description: Unique address identifier assigned when geocoding the data set with the City of Detroit Base Unit data set.

variableMeasured.name: street_num
variableMeasured.description: Street number of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.

variableMeasured.name: street_dir
variableMeasured.description: Street direction of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.

variableMeasured.name: street_name
variableMeasured.description: Street name of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.

variableMeasured.name: street_type
variableMeasured.description: Street type of the property address where either the business is located or another location where the business owner conducts business.
